movies.title: Slam Dunk
movies.Plot: About Sakuragi Hanamichi, a freshman of Shohoku High School who joins the basketball team because of the girl he has a crush on, Haruko. Although he is newbie in this sport, he is no ordinary basketball player.

movies.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
movies.Plot: Yugi Moto solves an Ancient Egyptian Puzzle and brings forth a dark and powerful alter ego. Whenever he and his friends are threatened by evil in Duel Monster Card Game, this alter ego breaks out to save them.

movies.title: DEATH NOTE
movies.Plot: An intelligent high school student goes on a secret crusade to eliminate criminals from the world after discovering a notebook capable of killing anyone whose name is written into it.

movies.title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
movies.Plot: Two brothers search for a Philosopher's Stone after an attempt to revive their deceased mother goes awry and leaves them in damaged physical forms.

movies.title: InuYasha
movies.Plot: The past catches up with the world of Inuyasha and Kagome's present in a form they could never have anticipated.

movies.title: KenIchi: The Mightiest Disciple
movies.Plot: "Weak Legs" Kenichi Shirahama would rather spend his time reading self improvement books than fighting.

movies.title: Naruto
movies.Plot: Naruto, Kakashi, Sakura, and Rock Lee are assigned to protect Michiru, the prince of the Land of the Moon, while he travel the world. The prince purchased a tiger Sham and the whole circus, which became the team's protection.

movies.title: Ouran High School Host Club
movies.Plot: You'll fall for the Ouran Host Club: Tamaki's truly romantic. Kaoru and Hikaru display brotherly love, Kyoya's brainy, Honey's innocent, and Mori's manly. Oh, and don't forget Haruhi. He knows what girls want, because he's a girl ...

movies.title: Gurren Lagann
movies.Plot: Two friends, Simon and Kamina, become the symbols of rebellion against the powerful Spiral King, who forced mankind into subterranean villages.

movies.title: Puella Magi Madoka Magica
movies.Plot: A creature named Kyubey offers Madoka and Sayaka a wish if they agree to become 'magical girls' and fight abstract beings called 'witches'. However, a magical girl named Homura is, for uncertain reasons, determined to stop this ag...

movies.title: Magic Knight Rayearth
movies.Plot: Lucy, Anias and Marina, three girls from different schools are transported to the world of Zephyr as well as their mission to become Magical Warriors to rescue the captured Princess Esmeralda.

movies.title: Vampire Knight
movies.Plot: Yuki Cross, a student at the Cross Academy, acts as guardian to the school's vampire population.

movies.title: Dinosaur King
movies.Plot: Max Taylor is the son of paleontologist Dr Spike Taylor and is a fan of dinosaurs.

movies.title: Magi
movies.Plot: A young boy, on Christmas morning, recognizes the severity of his mother's illness and undergoes a revelation about sacrifice and the true meaning of giving.

movies.title: TIGER & BUNNY
movies.Plot: Another entry in the Tiger and Bunny franchise, about the reality show star superheroes of a major city. Follows Tiger and Bunny: The Rising (2014).

movies.title: Your lie in April
movies.Plot: A piano prodigy who lost his ability to play after suffering a traumatic event in his childhood is forced back into the spotlight by an eccentric girl with a secret of her own.

movies.title: AJIN: Demi-Human
movies.Plot: A high school student discovers he is an Ajin, a demi-human being. He ends up a fugitive on the run because of his powers.

movies.title: The Seven Deadly Sins
movies.Plot: N/A

movies.title: Inuyasha: The Final Act
movies.Plot: InuYasha's story draws to a close but not before finding Naraku and the Sacred Jewel, and facing new enemies and new dangers.

movies.title: Kuroko's Basketball
movies.Plot: Kagami meets Kuroko, the 6th member of the Miracle Generation, and they make a pact to defeat the other members of the team. A battle of light (Kagami) and shadow (Kuroko) begins.

movies.title: Kamisama Kiss
movies.Plot: Nanami is left homeless after her father runs away due to debts. When she saves a man named Mikage from dogs, he gives her his house which turns out to be a shrine and she becomes the new deity.

movies.title: Detective Conan
movies.Plot: Conan and Kogoro Mori was tasked to solve a crime on a given time. The lives of their loved ones(as well as their own) are on the line. Solving the mystery means saving everyone.

movies.title: Haikyu!!
movies.Plot: N/A

movies.title: Castlevania
movies.Plot: Castlevania, the Machinima, is based on the popular video game franchise from Konami. Tracking the adventures of vampire hunter; Richter Belmont and his dreaded battle with the Lord of Darkness, Dracula.

movies.title: B: The Beginning
movies.Plot: In this anime series, scientists hope "new humans" will create universal peace, but they're kidnapped by an evil group with very different plans.

movies.title: Kuromukuro
movies.Plot: When mecha attack a research center, its students, pilots, and researchers must fight back with the help of mysterious artifacts and a young samurai.

movies.title: One Piece
movies.Plot: This "One Piece" spin-off is about three high school students: a male, his girlfriend, and a third wheel who is a huge One Piece fan

movies.title: The Disastrous Life of Saiki K.
movies.Plot: Saiki Kusuo is a powerful psychic who hates attracting attention, yet he is surrounded by colorful characters who always find a way to remove him from his everyday life.

movies.title: GTO: Great Teacher Onizuka
movies.Plot: Onizuka, a former delinquent finds himself in the role of a high school teacher, facing students who behave just as he used to. Using unusual methods, he manages to reach through to his students and help them with their problems.

movies.title: My Hero Academia
movies.Plot: A group of youths aspiring to become professional superheroes, fight in a world full of people with abilities, also known as quirks. Deku and his fellow classmates from Hero Academy face Nine, the strongest villain yet.

movies.title: Charlotte
movies.Plot: The story takes place in an alternate reality where a small percentage of children manifest superhuman abilities upon reaching puberty. A focus is placed on Yuu Otosaka, a high school boy who awakens the ability to temporarily pos...

movies.title: Sailor Moon Crystal
movies.Plot: Usagi Tsukino is chosen to be a guardian of justice and is sent on a quest to locate a Silver Crystal before the Dark Kingdom invades the Earth.

movies.title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
movies.Plot: The discovery of an advanced model of combat mecha on their space colony throws a young man and his friends into involvement in an interplanetary war as the crew of a powerful fighting ship.

movies.title: World Trigger
movies.Plot: Suddenly one day, monsters called Neighbors emerge from a portal to a different world. Earth's weapons do not affect them, but a mysterious group of warriors begins to fight the Neighbors.

movies.title: Little Witch Academia
movies.Plot: Akko enrolls at the Luna Nova Witchcraft Academy. She's not the best student, but her bright attitude is the key to her and her friends' success.

movies.title: A.I.C.O.
movies.Plot: Everything Aiko knew was a lie. Now she's joining a team of Divers to reach the place where the Burst began to stop it for good and save her family.

movies.title: Mononoke
movies.Plot: A mysterious man called the Medicine Seller travels along feudal Japan, uncovering and slaying evil spirits called "Mononoke".

movies.title: Children of the Whales
movies.Plot: As a magic weilder, young archivist Chakuro knows his life will be short, but everything changes when a mysterious girl from the outside arrives on his island.

movies.title: ID-0
movies.Plot: In the midst of a field exercise operating I-Machines, Alliance Academy student Maya Mikuri is thrown into an entirely different kind of adventure.

movies.title: Devilman Crybaby
movies.Plot: With demons reawakened and humanity in turmoil, a sensitive demon-boy is led into a brutal, degenerate war against evil by his mysterious friend.

movies.title: Kakegurui
movies.Plot: Hyakaou Academy is an institute where the academic ranking is based on the pupils' gambling winnings. Yumeko is new to the academy. Her pretty enchantress looks are only surpassed by her voracious appetite to gamble it all and win...

movies.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
movies.Plot: The story of the Joestar family, who are possessed with intense psychic strength, and the adventures each member encounters throughout their lives.

movies.title: Fate/Apocrypha
movies.Plot: In an alternate universe, the Holy Grail War was won by the Yggdamillenia family. Now two factions with 7 Master-Servant pairs each and 1 extra Servant as the Ruler are fighting to win the Greater Holy Grail.

movies.title: Violet Evergarden
movies.Plot: In the aftermath of a great war, Violet Evergarden, a young female ex-soldier, gets a job at a writers' agency and goes on assignments to create letters that can connect people.

movies.title: 7SEEDS
movies.Plot: In the immediate future, a giant meteorite has collided with earth. All living organisms, including mankind, have been wiped off the face of the planet.

movies.title: Fate/EXTRA Last Encore
movies.Plot: Hakuno awakens in a virtual realm with amnesia, forced into a deadly conflict for the mythical Holy Grail that can grant any wish. Aided by an enigmatic "Servant," he must battle friends and foes alike to unravel the truth of his ...

movies.title: LOST SONG
movies.Plot: Rin, a young girl blessed with the power of song goes through on a journey trying to get to the capital to sing, little does she know, there's another girl who also has the power of song named finis.

movies.title: Rilakkuma and Kaoru
movies.Plot: Her life might be a little mundane, but Kaoru gets to go home to Rilakkuma, her endearingly lazy roommate who happens to be a fuzzy toy bear.

movies.title: Aggretsuko
movies.Plot: Frustrated with her thankless office job, the 25-year-old red panda copes with her daily struggles by belting out heavy metal karaoke after work.

movies.title: HERO MASK
movies.Plot: Detective James Blood investigates a string of grisly crimes all involving a mysterious mask.

movies.title: BAKI
movies.Plot: The protagonist, Baki Hanma, trains with an intense focus to become strong enough to surpass his father, Yujiro Hanma, the strongest fighter in the world.

movies.title: Dino Girl Gauko
movies.Plot: A children's animation on a seemingly typical girl who turns into a ferocious dinosaur when she is angry.

movies.title: Seis Manos
movies.Plot: Orphans raised by a martial arts master are plunged into a mystery involving demonic powers, drug cartels, ancient rituals and blood sacrifice.

movies.title: LAST HOPE
movies.Plot: After causing the near extinction of mankind seven years ago, genius scientist Leon Lau must now fight the ecological disaster he unwittingly created.

movies.title: Cagaster of an Insect Cage
movies.Plot: Insects that eat people. A girl with secrets in her past. A young exterminator who's almost too good at his job.

movies.title: Ultraman

movies.title: Godzilla Singular Point

movies.title: Black Clover

movies.title: Forest of Piano

movies.title: RESIDENT EVIL: Infinite Darkness

movies.title: Dorohedoro
movies.Plot: Amnesiac Caiman seeks to undo his lizard head curse by killing the sorcerer responsible, with his friend Nikaido's help. In the Hole, that's a threat.

movies.title: CAROLE & TUESDAY
movies.Plot: Two girls, from different backgrounds but sharing a love for music, meet and change history with their united musical talent.

movies.title: KENGAN ASHURA
movies.Plot: It's the ultimate showdown. The toughest fighters from Baki Hanma (2021) and Kengan Ashura (2019) clash in this unprecedented, hard-hitting martial arts crossover.

movies.title: Eden
movies.Plot: A human girl secretly raised by robots starts to uncover the dark secrets behind her lush, utopian world where humanity has all but vanished.

movies.title: Dragon's Dogma
movies.Plot: Ethan sets out to vanquish the Dragon that took his heart, but with every demon he battles, he loses more of his humanity.

movies.title: revisions
movies.Plot: While planning a wedding with his fiancé, a writer struggles to find the perfect ending to a story about a restless magician.

movies.title: Ingress: The Animation
movies.Plot: After scientists discover a mysterious substance that can influence human minds, two factions wage an all-out battle to control its awesome power.

movies.Plot: After encounters with a dragon and a princess on her own mission, a Dragon Knight becomes embroiled in events larger than he could have ever imagined.

movies.Plot: In imperial Tokyo, a team calling itself "Jaegers" secretly pursues vampires in search of the Ark of Sirius. One of the Jaegers is Yuliy, a young werewolf.

movies.Plot: The day the three Suns and three Moons came together in alignment over Idhun, Ashran the necromancer seized power and the reign of the winged snakes started.

movies.Plot: After Kaiju ravage Australia, two siblings pilot a Jaeger to search for their parents, encountering new creatures, seedy characters and chance allies.

movies.title: Tekken: Bloodline
movies.Plot: Follow Jin Kazama and his fight to become one of the best fighters in the King of the Iron Fist tournament.

movies.title: exception
movies.Plot: In the distant future, human beings have been forced to leave earth and migrate to another galaxy. An advanced team of spacecraft arrives at a planet that is to be terraformed. Each member of the team is output by a biological 3D ...

movies.title: Captain Tsubasa
movies.Plot: Tsubasa, Misaki, Wakabayashi, Hyuga, and Wakashimazu are ready to represent Japan against the best soccer players of the world in the International Junior Youth Tournament in Paris.

movies.title: Aggretsuko: We Wish You a Metal Christmas
Violet Evergarden: Special
movies.Plot: N/A

movies.Plot: Unknown creatures. Deadly pitfalls. With so many reckless adventures out to make fortune, someone's got to rescue them.

movies.Plot: In 2045, cybernetic mercenary Motoko Kusanagi returns to Section 9 to face dangerous threats.

movies.Plot: A teenage boy finds himself recruited as a member of an elite team of pilots by his father.

movies.Plot: High schooler Yuri finds herself atop a skyscraper in a strange world, where she must survive against masked assailants bent on killing their prey.

movies.title: Kabaneri of the Iron Fortress: The Battle of Unato
movies.Plot: The film chronicles the attempt of the team to take back Unato castle.

movies.title: The Quintessential Quintuplets

movies.title: Tokyo Override

movies.title: Sonic X

movies.title: KAKEGURUI TWIN

movies.title: MAKE MY DAY
movies.Plot: On an icy mining planet (aka a prison world) mysterious disappearances point to deadly secrets hidden within the mines.

movies.title: Dragon Age: Absolution

movies.title: Yakitori: Soldiers of Misfortune

movies.title: Onmyoji

movies.title: Garouden: The Way of the Lone Wolf

movies.title: Terminator Zero

movies.title: BNA
movies.Plot: Morphed into a raccoon beastman, Michiru seeks refuge, and answers, with the aid of wolf beastman Shirou inside the special zone of Anima-City.

movies.title: Great Pretender

movies.title: Komi Can't Communicate

movies.title: Bee and PuppyCat

movies.title: VINLAND SAGA

movies.title: The Way of the Househusband

movies.title: Thermae Romae Novae

movies.Plot: A popular manga creator becomes enmeshed in paranormal events while conducting research.

movies.title: PLUTO
movies.Plot: When the world's seven most advanced robots and their human allies are murdered one by one, inspector Gesicht soon discovers that he's also in danger.

movies.title: Akuma Kun

movies.Plot: N/A

movies.title: Uncle from Another World
movies.Plot: Takafumi's uncle awakens from a 17-year coma. He had actually gone to another world, and has returned with magical powers. But now that he's back, Takafumi must help him survive in his original world.

movies.title: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse
movies.Plot: A new generation of adventurers comes together to change the world, as a prophecy states. But will they bring good or destruction?

movies.title: Rising Impact
movies.Plot: Follows the growth of third-grader Gawain Nanaumi as he encounters the sport of golf and competes with his rivals.

movies.title: Delicious in Dungeon
movies.Plot: Can sisters be reincarnated from dragon meat? Laios and his friends Marcille and Chilchuck delve into an endless dungeon in search of his fallen sister, fighting monsters, starvation, and corruption.

movies.title: My Happy Marriage
movies.Plot: An unhappy young woman from an abusive family is married off to a fearsome and chilly army commander. But the two learn more about each other, love may have a chance.

movies.title: Hell's Paradise: Jigokuraku
movies.Plot: A squad of prisoners and their guards are sent to investigate a mysterious island. They get stranded there and must rely on each other to survive the island's mysterious and monstrous residents.

movies.title: No Doubt in Us
movies.Plot: When an emperor accidentally switches bodies with his empress, the two must deal with the awkward fallouts as they learn to accept each other.

movies.title: Qi Refining for 3000 Years
movies.Plot: Bai Qiuran is one of Qingming's disciples, and has a lot of potential to be his successor. Even though he's still a Qi cultivator, he believes he will finally make his breakthrough this time. As such, Bai Qiuran decides to go down...

movies.title: Blue Box
movies.Plot: Third-year student Taiki joins badminton club. Despite being an early riser, star player Chinatsu, his crush, arrives first. Living together unexpectedly, Taiki strives to reach Nationals to impress Chinatsu.

movies.title: SAKAMOTO DAYS
movies.Plot: Once the world's most feared hitman, Taro Sakamoto falls in love with Store Clerk Aoi. Leaving his violent past, he retires to live a peaceful life. But old enemies threaten to pull him back into the life he thought he'd left for ...

movies.title: One Piece: 3D2Y - Overcome Ace's Death! Luffy's Vow to His Friends
One Piece Adventure of Nebulandia
movies.Plot: The special has the Straw Hat Pirates fight Foxy again in the New World, on Mushroom Island. This soon gives way to a battle against the Marines on an island called Nebulandia that can nullify Devil Fruit powers.

movies.title: One Piece Episode of East blue - Luffy and His Four Crewmates' Great Adventure
One Piece Episode of Skypiea
movies.Plot: Episode of Sky Island is a TV Special of the One Piece anime. It is a retelling of the Sky Island Saga, particularly Skypiea Arc.

movies.title: Zom 100: Bucket List of the Dead
movies.Plot: A worker in a foreign finance company is bullied and worked around the clock, before a zombie outbreak finally makes him feel alive.

movies.title: Magic and Muscles
movies.Plot: Into a world of magicians is born Mash, a young boy who lacks magic but is the strongest person around. His existence and destiny will change his world.

movies.title: Pokémon Horizons: The Series
movies.Plot: Two young adventurers on a thrilling quest visit new lands, unravel ancient mysteries, and encounter Pokémon and Poké Balls they've never seen before.

movies.title: Rurouni Kenshin
movies.Plot: The adventures of a young wandering swordsman who stumbles upon a struggling martial arts school in Meiji era Japan.

movies.title: Pokémon: To Be a Pokémon Master: Ultimate Journeys: The Series
The Apothecary Diaries
movies.Plot: A young maiden is kidnapped and sold into servitude at the emperor's palace, where she secretly employs her pharmacist skills with the help of the head eunuch to unravel medical mysteries in the inner court.

movies.title: Chi’s Sweet Adventure
movies.Plot: Chi is a sweet playful kitten who's always full of energy. She lives with the loving Yamada family.

movies.title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed Destiny
movies.Plot: Two years after a war, tensions rise again. Shinn, whose family died, is haunted. Athrun tries to protect Cagalli while preventing conflict as ZAFT's new mobile suits are stolen.

movies.title: Frieren: Beyond Journey's End
movies.Plot: Elf mage Frieren and her fellow adventurers have defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the land. But Frieren will long outlive the rest of her former party. How will she come to understand what life means to the people arou...

movies.title: Monsters 103 Mercies Dragon Damnation
movies.Plot: A samurai's path leads him to a young waitress whose hometown was destroyed by a dragon. He doesn't want any trouble, but it finds them anyway.

movies.title: DAN DA DAN
movies.Plot: Momo and Okarun set out on their latest adventure, traveling to a hot springs town home rented by Jiji, Momo's childhood friend and former crush, with the goal to solve the mystery surrounding his family.

movies.title: Shaman King Flowers
movies.Plot: Asakura Hana's monotonous life takes an unexpected turn when a family feud erupts, challenging him to battle for supremacy within his own clan, igniting excitement he craved.

movies.title: Orb: On the Movements of the Earth
movies.Plot: After learning heretical teachings about the Earth and the Sun, a child prodigy searches for his master's hidden research while evading the Inquisition.

movies.title: Kinnikuman Perfect Origin Arc
movies.Plot: Kinnikuman returns to the ring in an epic three-way battle between the Seigi, Akuma and Perfect Chojin factions and reveals the roots of the Chojin.

movies.title: Sakuna: Of Rice and Ruin
movies.Plot: In the easternmost corner of the country of Yanato, people have believed since ancient times that there are two worlds in this country.

movies.title: BEYBLADE X
movies.Plot: A young boy who aims to be a professional Beyblade player. He aims to get to X Tower, where professional Beyblade players gather.

movies.title: Dragon Ball DAIMA
movies.Plot: Due to a conspiracy, Goku and friends are transformed into children. They intend to travel to a mysterious new world to undo this change.

movies.title: Pokémon Horizons: Season 2: The Search for Laqua
One Piece Fan Letter
movies.Plot: Two years after the Paramount War, the Straw Hats are about to reunite on the Sabaody Archipelago. At the same time, a girl who is head over heels for Nami is trying to hand a fan letter to her before the group leaves the island.

movies.title: The Summer Hikaru Died
movies.Plot: Hikaru vanishes, replaced by an entity with his appearance, voice, and memories. The mysterious being maintains Hikaru's persona, making distinguishing it from the real Hikaru challenging as they continue their daily routines.

movies.title: Tougen Anki
movies.Plot: When Shiki's father is killed, he discovers he has demon ancestry and enters a secret war going on between demons and heroes.

movies.title: WITCH WATCH
movies.Plot: A dire prophecy hangs over the young witch Nico. Can her childhood friend Morihito keep her safe or will Nico's out-of-control magic get in the way?

movies.title: The Fragrant Flower Blooms With Dignity
movies.Plot: An elite girls' school resides next to a boys' school for delinquents. One day, two students from each school, Kaoruko and Rintaro, meet and develop a connection.

movies.title: YAIBA: Samurai Legend
movies.Plot: The series follows the titular Yaiba Kurogane a samurai boy inspired by Miyamoto Musashi, the real-life swordsman who made the Hyoho Niten Ichi-ryu style of two-sword fighting and wrote The Book of Five Rings classic on military s...

movies.title: SHIBOYUGI: Playing Death Games to Put Food on the Table
